items.title: Color schemes
items.description: Navbar themes are easier than ever thanks to Bootstrap’s combination of Sass and CSS variables. The default is our “light navbar” for use with light background colors, but you can also apply data-bs-theme="dark" to the .navbar parent for dark background colors. Then, customize with .bg-* and additional utilities.
items.code:
<nav class="navbar bg-dark border-bottom border-body" data-bs-theme="dark">
  <!-- Navbar content -->
</nav>

<nav class="navbar bg-primary" data-bs-theme="dark">
  <!-- Navbar content -->
</nav>

<nav class="navbar" style="background-color: #e3f2fd;">
  <!-- Navbar content -->
</nav>
